# Skill: System Design

## Overview

This skill provides capabilities for designing scalable, reliable, and maintainable software systems. It includes knowledge of architectural patterns, diagramming standards (C4), and trade-off analysis.

## Capabilities

- **Architectural Pattern Selection**: Choosing the right pattern (Microservices, Monolith, Event-Driven) based on requirements.
- **C4 Model Diagramming**: Creating Context, Container, Component, and Code level diagrams.
- **Trade-off Analysis**: Evaluating decisions based on CAP theorem, latency vs. throughput, etc.

## Resources

- [Architecture Patterns](./resources/architecture-patterns.md)
- [C4 Model Guide](./resources/c4-model.md)

## Usage

Activate this skill when the user asks for high-level design, system diagrams, or architectural advice.
